title: Taking control of citations and references
description: About 15% of all papers I edit have manually inserted citations and references. Fifteen percent! I find this both baffling and frustrating. Why on earth would you put yourself through the process of typing in all those references? And on a more ego-centric note, why would you put an editor (me!) through the process of checking the formatting of all of these when a programme could do it for you for free?
